text.text: The next stage is the fossil grinder. This is where most of your fossils will be wasted as it's very rare to find soft tissues. However, the waste can be used as bonemeal.
The fossil grinder just requires a redstone input. Once you have soft tissue, it's onto the next step.
Once again, new players may find the fossil grinder expensive as it requires a diamond, however it should be easy enough.
